title: Mobile Microlearning Program Based on Healthy Eating Habits Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic nutrition and food science concepts
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, emphasizing acquisition of science knowledge applicable to daily life for students and job seekers

learning_goals: Learners can develop personalized meal plans based on nutrient balance and principles of food selection.
Learners can explain the connection between healthy eating habits and disease prevention by analyzing scientific research data.
Learners can evaluate real-time dietary data collected in mobile environments and propose improvement strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
